about_the_game:
Are three-dimensional creatures pouring into your world? Crazed business animals with nefarious plans? A globetrotting adventure and a death race against the clock? Well, all in a day’s work for newly minted heroes Jeeve and Jayla.



Your adventure follows sibling foxes Jeeve and Jayla as they rush to stop their world from being overrun by monsters from the 3rd dimension. A calamitous event happens every 100 years and opens the barrier between the citizens of the second and third dimensions. With the barrier open the monsters rush the citizens and dwindle their numbers each cycle. Now with another cycle upon them and the world still ravaged from the last event, it’ll be up to the twins to find a way to permanently seal the dimension, or Alteria will cease to exist . . . No pressure right?



Tails from Alteria is an adventure RPG with a heavy emphasis on exploration and action command combat. The world is littered with nooks and crannies for you to explore and engaging encounters to test your reflexes.

Features
--------------------------
  • Sprawling sandbox styled levels for players to explore.
  • Gorgeous 2.5D graphics and beautiful blend of 2d characters in 3d.
  • Challenging and engaging action command combat.
  • Unique and colorful characters to interact with and befriend.

  • Processor: i3-10100/Ryzen 4500u
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 750ti/Radeon 7 Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-7700k/Ryzen 4800u
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti/Rx 5500xt

short_description: Tails From Alteria is a wacky RPG that follows the misadventures of twin foxes Jeeve and Jayla Javari, as they race against unseen forces and try to stop the world from ending.
